slides.title: Economic Sectors
slides.content:
**Primary:** Agriculture, Mining
**Secondary:** Manufacturing
**Tertiary:** Services

**India:** Service sector largest contributor to GDP

slides.title: Key Terms
slides.content:
**GDP:** Total value of goods/services
**Inflation:** Rise in prices
**Fiscal Policy:** Tax & spending
**Monetary Policy:** Money supply (RBI)

slides.title: Budget
slides.content:
**Union Budget:** Presented by Finance Minister
**Fiscal Year:** April 1 - March 31
**Revenue:** Tax + Non-tax
**Expenditure:** Planned + Non-planned
